input_full.title: Dedicated MCP self-improvement tools
input_full.body:
Add purpose-built MCP tools for the self-improvement skill, replacing ad-hoc analysis with structured endpoints.

**Proposed tools:**

- **Interruption analysis** — Script generates a report of user interruptions and surrounding context. Served for both automated (self-improve) and manual review.
- **Skill stats report** — Aggregated statistics per skill: invocation count, success rate, average duration, common failure modes.
- **Other canonical tools** — Identify additional recurring analysis patterns in self-improve and promote them to dedicated MCP endpoints.

**Motivation:** Self-improve currently relies on general-purpose archive queries. Dedicated tools would produce more targeted, actionable insights with less token overhead.

---
🤖 Created with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)
